title: Hygiphylus, sive de febre maligna dialogus ... In quo, de vexicantium medicamentorum, hyacinthi, zaphiri, smaragdi, et aliorum; de auri, et argenti in re medica abusu, et de optimo theriacae usu circa malignam febrem, tractatur / [Francesco India]
author: India, Francesco, active 16th century
